title: Nick Jonas gushes over Priyanka Chopra as she observes her first Hindu Karwa Chauth holiday
text:
She married Nick Jonas in her native India last December.

And the 27-year-old gushed over his wife Priyanka Chopra, 27, on Wednesday as she rang in her first Karwa Chauth at a Jonas Brothers concert in San Diego.

Karwa Chauth is a Hindu holiday in which married women fast from sunrise until moonrise for their husbands' long lives.

Big day: Nick Jonas gushed over his wife Priyanka Chopra, 27, on Wednesday as she rang in her first Karwa Chauth at a Jonas Brothers concert in San Diego

In recent years some couples have adjusted to the changing times by having both spouses keep the fast, but Nick did not say whether he did so.

He shared a heartwarming Instagram album of him and Priyanka goofing around and mugging for the camera while modeling stylish Indian clothes.

'My wife is Indian. She is Hindu, and she is incredible in every way. She has taught me so much about her culture and religion,' he wrote.

Messing around: He shared a heartwarming Instagram album of him and Priyanka goofing around and mugging for the camera while modeling stylish Indian clothes

Priyanka's new husband added: 'I love and admire her so much, and as you can see we have fun together. Happy Karva Chauth to everyone!'

The Bollywood star modeled a glamorous sari in red and gold, the colors traditionally associated with Hindu bridal attire.

She had both Christian and Hindu weddings with Nick in Jodhpur last year and for the latter, she wore a sumptuous red and gold number by the highly regarded Indian fashion designer Sabyasachi Mukherji.

On brand: The Bollywood star modeled a glamorous sari in red and gold, the colors traditionally associated with Hindu bridal attire

In her own Instagram post marking the holiday, she was decked out in her Indian look while cuddling up to her husband, who was in western clothes.

'Karwa chauth at a @jonasbrothers concert. Definitely a first I’ll always remember!' she wrote, tagging the Pechanga Arena in San Diego.

Priyanka has lately been doing the publicity rounds for The Sky Is Pink, her grand return to Hindi cinema after she burst onto the Hollywood scene in 2016.
